actions-list.actionItem: The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2521.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
Mr. Takano moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended. H.R. 2521 â€” "To require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a pilot program to furnish doula services to veterans."
The Speaker announced that votes on suspensions, if ordered, will be postponed until a time to be announced.
The House resumed with one minute speeches.
The House proceeded with one minute speeches.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTED WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the death of the gentleman from Virginia, Mr. McEachin, the whole number of the House is 432.
The Chair designated Mr. Wilson of SC to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal. Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
